sqls.sql: SELECT ss_tbl4_f1, ss_tbl4_f2, ss_tbl4_f3, ss_tbl4_f4, ss_tbl4_f5, ss_tbl4_f6, ss_tbl4_f7, ss_tbl4_f8, ss_tbl4_f9, ss_tbl4_f10, ss_tbl4_f11, ss_tbl4_f12, ss_tbl4_f13, ss_tbl4_f14, ss_tbl4_f15, ss_tbl4_f16, ss_tbl4_f17, ss_tbl4_f18, ss_tbl4_f19, ss_tbl4_f20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ss_tbl4 WHERE ss_tbl4_id = @ss_tbl4_id;
